name: Oatmeal Raisin Clif® Bars
author: Laura
summary: Oatmeal, cinnamon, raisins, and dates are the main ingredients in this delicious, healthy, and kid-friendly treat! Find the dates in the bulk aisle of large grocery stores or health-food stores.
ingredients: ½ cup pitted dates coated in coconut
½ cup crisp brown rice cereal
directions: Place dates in a large bowl and break apart using a wooden spoon
Add oats and brown rice cereal; stir until evenly combined
Mix raisins, almonds, flax seed meal, water, protein powder, and cinnamon into date mixture until dough sticks together
Shape dough into 2-bite or 4-bite bars and store in an air-tight container in the refrigerator
